introSection.title: Using crypto to target social protection

firstSection.first: Proof of Integrity is an initiative that helps struggling communities to reduce poverty through financial training and crypto embracement.

secondSection.first: We are integrated with the Proof of Humanity initiative, and our vision is to onboard every human in need to the platform.

banner.title: Urgent Needs Require Urgent Answers
banner.bubble1: There are at least 1.3 billion people experiencing poverty worldwide.
banner.bubble2: 788 million people share household with one or more undernourished person.

aboutPOI.subtitleFirstParagraph: Creemos en el impacto social de la blockchain
aboutPOI.descriptionFirstParagraph: We believe in the social impact of the blockchain. Our mission is to lay bridges between donors and beneficiaries, giving the latter financial instruments to help them thrive.
aboutPOI.descriptionSecondParagraph: Addressing the main problem of donors is the key to unlocking these new bonds in a transparent and decentralized way. By contributing through the blockchain, there are 0 intermediaries between the donors and the beneficiaries.
aboutPOI.descriptionThirdParagraph: Our team is composed of programmers, impact measurement experts, communicators, social workers and crypto enthusiasts who share the same vision: reducing poverty by bringing blockchain to the most people possible.

firstBox.firstSentence: Our pilot will focus on offering a crypto-finance educational program and funding the
firstBox.thirdSentence: needed to join the Proof of Humanity platform.

aimBox.title: Who will be aimed at?
aimBox.firstItem: Young people recently graduated from school
aimBox.secondItem: In a low-income neighborhood in Buenos Aires
aimBox.thirdItem: We'll partner with Club Mugica, a local community center

publicAudit.title: Public Audit
publicAudit.noDataText: Our pilot program is aimed to start on

descriptions.damianWasserman: Founder of Beon Tech Studio, with 20 years of experience in the software industry.
descriptions.juanHeado: With 20+ years of experience in tech, he helped develop version 2 of $UBI with Santi Siri.
descriptions.pabloSabbatella: Dedicated to the research, investment, and dissemination of the crypto & DeFi ecosystem.
descriptions.brianSztamfater: Brian is a blockchain entrepreneur, software architect & author. He founded @CromyNFT.
descriptions.diegoBoryszanski: Lawyer by profession, Diego is a serial technology entrepreneur and a crypto enthusiast.

partnersSection.defyEducation: We are partners with Defy Education.

whyUS.title: With POI, your donations go to the right hands.

contactUS.title: Contact Us
contactUS.subtitle: Get in touch with us.  We'd love to hear from you.
